name: Winter Sports Mania
description:
Join a competition in sport events. Alpine skiing, speedskating, snowboarding, ski jumping, you can play all of these winter sports simulations in Winter Sports Mania. Train, overcome challenges, and win winter sports competitions around the world. Do you have what it takes to stay on top of winter sports leaderboards and rankings in these athletic winter games?

Winter Sports Mania: Speed skate, Ski and Snowboard is an action winter sports game with RPG, simulation and manager elements. You can control, improve and train your athlete as you see fit. You decide everything that goes on - improve your attributes, buy better equipment, learn new skills, build up your club with your friends, defeat opponents from all over the world in winter competitions, win athletic winter games and be at the top rank of the winter sports leaderboards. You can play either singleplayer or multiplayer with your friends and club members. Prepare yourself and win competitions! Put your gloves on and get ready for freezing weather. Take on the challenges and play winter sports games.

The game includes the following winter sports disciplines:
Ski jumping
Biathlon
Speed skating
Bobsleigh
Cross-country skiing
Snowboard cross
Short track
Luge
Giant slalom
Downhill

The features of the game include:
Competitions against players from all over the world
Multiplayer
RPG elements
Career mode with a story
Diverse minigames that will test your skills
Clubs and club competitions against real players
